body_html: I've got a new tutorial up at https://petewarden.com/2016/09/27/tensorflow-for-mobile-poets/ that shows how to process the retrained model to avoid memory issues and run successfully. I'm hoping this solves these problems, so I'm closing this bug. Please re-open if you aren't able to get around the original issue with this approach.
